title: Puppy_Linux_AlphaT64_20-Mar-2014
description:
alphat64 using base from alphaOS 14.5 _ UEFI

by ndrancs

Released 20-Mar-2014


more at http://alphaos.tuxfamily.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=13&t=1045

and http://www.murga-linux.com/puppy/viewtopic.php?t=92727


hi all, 

 I am pleased to introduce this hybrid OS named alphat64. It is using alphaOS_14.5 as its base, alphaOS being derived from Arch Linux. 
 In a short description, this OS is arch based OS but with initrd from Fatdog630, and a puppy linux like init. 

What have I changed from the original alphaOS? 
 
- Initrd replaced with the use of initrd fd630 
 - UEFI idea from fd630 too 
 - using stable kernel 3.13 .config is from alphaOS 14.5 

 

 I am open to every good input likes bug report, suggestions and criticisms or patch 

 credits: 
 - James Budiono 
 - Kirk 
 - Simargl, alphaOS original author
